fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Enlargement, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: EU policy on European standardization as defined in EU Regulation 1025/2012 and other EU policies/legislative initiatives involving European standardization
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations

goals__remit: Is responsible for standardization in the electrotechnical engineering. It is the recognized European organisation according to Regulation 1025/2012 for the planning, drafting and adoption of European standards in the electrotechnical engineering field
